issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add concat function in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6134](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6134). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- remove concat alias for concatOperator
   \* add concat(utf8, utf8) function. The difference between concat and concatOperator is in null input handling. concatOperator returns null if one of the inputs is null; concat treats null input as empty string

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6134?focusedCommentId=16902860) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5008
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5008>
